entry.title: Operation: Sleep Well, Destroy Better
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,828Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 197

Summary: Clark Kent's marriage to Bruce Wayne threw him straight into the chaos of the Batfam—a den of chronic insomnia and neglected self-care. Determined to enforce at least a bare minimum of healthy routine, Clark declared war on sleepless nights and diets of pure black coffee.Some accepted the changes reluctantly. But Tim Drake? Tim was a whole other challenge.After countless failed attempts to convince him to take better care of himself, Clark decided to fight dirty. The offer? 90 days of regulated sleep and less coffee in exchange for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity—to humiliate Lex Luthor.Now, the looming question: Will Tim hold up his end of the deal, or will his work obsession (and caffeine addiction) sabotage his own revenge?

entry.title: Dome Protocol
entry.summary:
Author: ToTheLastWord

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,337Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 270

Summary: “I think he created the device for an end-of-the-world scenario,” Bruce said, voice carefully neutral. When a mysterious device sends the Batkids' future sons and daughters to the past, right in the middle of the cave, none of them is ready. Not the new kids, whose family as they know it is back in a different time, and certainly not Bruce's own children, too young to be parents.With the six now stuck in a time in which they don't exist yet, hurt by a future that will never be, the Batkids will have to decide what it truly means to be a family and how to face the ghosts of choices not yet taken.AKAThe Batkids meet their future children and everything gets complicated.- - - -Part of a series dedicated to the Batkids' kids, this is a STAND-ALONE fic.

entry.title: Inheritance of Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: Pistolbag

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,345Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 28

Summary: In Gotham’s grim streets, there’s always a new face: an old ghost in a new skin. But when a young girl, feral and untrained, is discovered in a dark corner of Gotham's underground by Batman and Robin during a mission to stop David Cain, the dynamic of the Bat-Family is forever changed.

entry.title: Inclination of the instinctual variety.
entry.summary:
Author: NightmareWelfare

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,126Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 151

entry.title: To be a hero
entry.summary:
Author: Savage_vigilante

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,527Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Being a hero doesn’t always mean taking down the bad guys or saving the world. Sometimes being a hero means helping people when they need it the most, and the bat family is no exception.This is a collection of one shots, following different members of the bat family as they try in their own ways to put a little good in the world.

entry.title: In Shadows We Bind Our Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: RaineKellen64

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,604Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 218

Summary: The Batkids are stuck in a time loop where Bruce sacrifices himself to save them every time. Once they break the time loop, nothing is going to stop them from keeping their dad safe, even from himself.OrThe consequences of losing your dad one too many times.OrI love platonic yandere and overprotective Batkids, so I wrote it.-----------------------I have barely read any Batman comics, but I've read a boat load of fanfiction of them. They are OOC.P.S. There is no time line. The title is temporary. This is only my second fic.

entry.title: You'll Never Know The Bat Sitting Next To You
entry.summary:
Author: Deathpetal

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,128Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 878

Summary: Reeling from the fallout of a mission that compromised the Watchtower and threatens to expose the Justice League’s identities to the world, they retreat to the Batcave to regroup. They thought Batman was just cold, that he didn’t care. They thought wrong. And that shouldn’t surprise them as much as it does. After all, everyone knows that the Bat has trust issues.

entry.title: Wide Enough to Shield You All
entry.summary:
Author: Lumeleo

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,038Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 192

Summary: Ever since the first Robin was getting chilly in the cold Gotham nights, one of the most important functions of Batman's cape has been shielding his children. As time goes on and the magic of Gotham seeps further into their bones this protection only grows stronger.

entry.title: Shadows of Wayne: A Dark Reflection
entry.summary:
Author: theyfwmotherraven

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,626Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 173

Summary: In a world where Batman is dead, his children carry on the legacy in the shadows. When they kidnap an alternate Bruce Wayne who never donned the cape, they find a man more open, more trusting, and a far better father.Or,But only one chose to love him in the light. The other, consumed by darkness, loved Bruce to the point of madness.The contrast between the two Alfreds was stark. In the dark universe, Alfred's love had become a cage, bond to trap Bruce in a web of obsession and control, after his AUs death. He wouldn't make the same mistake again. None of them would as soon as Bruce was back in their graspOR,Bruce's breath catches as reality sinks in. Someone not only managed to take him down, but they'd also been in his home. With his kids. Fear shoots through him - how long had he been out? What if they'd come downstairs? His protective father instincts flare up despite his pain.Bruce carefully shifts his position, trying to sit up without waking the kids. He needs to assess the situation, find out what happened and who did this. His hand reaches out, fingers brushing against something cold and metallic on the floor. "What the..." He freezes as he sees it - a syringe.
